mapper.sql: dtl_id, book_dt, owner_id, trans_type, account_log_id, stl_dt, ttl_debit, ttl_credit, aval_debit, aval_credit, fzn_debit, fzn_credit, utf_debit, utf_credit, total, available, frozen, untransfer, real_book_ind, dc_flag, balance_type, memo, row_crt_ts, row_crt_usr, row_upd_ts, row_upd_usr
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from t_account_detail
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_account_detail (dtl_id, book_dt, owner_id, trans_type, account_log_id, stl_dt, ttl_debit, ttl_credit, aval_debit, aval_credit, fzn_debit, fzn_credit, utf_debit, utf_credit, total, available, frozen, untransfer, real_book_ind, dc_flag, balance_type, memo, row_crt_ts, row_crt_usr, row_upd_ts, row_upd_usr) values (#{dtlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bookDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stlDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttlDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttlCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avalDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{avalCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fznDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fznCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{utfDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{utfCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{frozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{untransfer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{realBookInd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dcFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{balanceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowCrtTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rowCrtUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowUpdTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rowUpdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update t_account_detail set book_dt = #{bookDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, trans_type = #{transType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_log_id = #{accountLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stl_dt = #{stlDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ttl_debit = #{ttlDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ttl_credit = #{ttlCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aval_debit = #{avalDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aval_credit = #{avalCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fzn_debit = #{fznDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fzn_credit = #{fznCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, utf_debit = #{utfDebit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, utf_credit = #{utfCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER}, available = #{available,jdbcType=INTEGER}, frozen = #{frozen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, untransfer = #{untransfer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, real_book_ind = #{realBookInd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dc_flag = #{dcFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, balance_type = #{balanceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, row_crt_ts = #{rowCrtTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, row_crt_usr = #{rowCrtUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, row_upd_ts = #{rowUpdTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, row_upd_usr = #{rowUpdUsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dtl_id = #{dtlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(1) as count,sum(aval_debit+fzn_debit+utf_debit) as incomeAmt, sum(aval_credit+fzn_credit+utf_credit) as outcomeAmt from t_account_detail a left join t_app_user b on a.owner_id=b.owner_id
